'''Tletl Ilhuicatl''' is a [[Realm Layout]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]] system.

The Realm Layout becomes available after completing the [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter V]]: Act I - [[Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn]] quest ''[[Home of the Hot Springs]]'' and using the item {{Item|Scroll of the Fiery Firmament}} purchased from [[Tubby]] in the [[Realm Depot]].

It comes with the [[Main Building/Mansion|Mansion]] [[Natlan Dwelling: "Lofty Tower"]].

==Descriptions==
{{Description|High above the sea of clouds, where the towering peaks bask in scorching sunlight, the air is permeated by an endless heat...|Realm Layout Preview}}
{{Description|A resting place formed by Adeptal Energy. It serves as a landing ground for [[Phlogiston]] Hot Air Balloons &mdash; the favored transport of Natlan's tribes. You can ride this balloon to various areas within Tletl Ilhuicatl...|Hot Air Balloon Stop [[Map]] Description}}

==Trivia==
* [[Halberd-Crest Bird]]s can be seen flying around the layout. These cannot be attacked.
===Etymology===
* ''Tletl Ilhuicatl'' comes from the {{w|Nahuatl}}, and is composed by the words ''{{wt|tletl}}'', meaning "fire"; and ''{{wt|ilhuicatl}}'' meaning "sky."
